name: Shfl (Xadrol)
description:
Hardly finished game but we wanted to upload what we got.

You are supposed to activate two pressure plates in the room to power a big pressure plate on the north side of the room which you need to activate to complete the level.

After completion the tiles inside of the room would realign to create a new level to beat. We were not able to actually implement all the movement of the tiles in time so all we got is one simple level to show the buttons and some of the tiles moving. We actually finished 3 levels but could not implement them because we were not fast enough for the deadline :(
